channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘We want to trust what we’ve heard’: Farmers remain unsettled on trade, even after China’s biggest U.S. soybean purchase in two years
item.description: China’s U.S. soybean haul has exceeded 1 million metric tons this month. Trump wants China to buy 12 million tons by the end of the year.

item.title: Cities Are Expanding Uphill, Threatening Global Biodiversity
item.description: New study reveals cities expanding into hillsides threaten 70% of endangered species worldwide. Learn how urban sprawl impacts biodiversity hotspots g...

item.title: Transportation chief offers advice to increasingly angry Americans: ‘Let’s maybe go back to an era where we didn’t wear our pajamas to the airport’
item.description: "Sometimes you just have to ask people, 'Hey, let's maybe go back to an era where we didn't wear our pajamas to the airport.'"

item.title: Middle-income Americans pessimistic about their financial future amid persistent inflation, analysis shows
item.description: Study reveals only 21% of middle-income Americans expect better finances next year, down from 33% in 2020, as inflation creates widespread pessimism.

item.title: Eliot Jackson’s On A Mission To Grow Cycling
item.description: From a $1.5 million LA pump track to youth conferences, Eliot Jackson is proving that diversity in cycling grows fastest when access starts at street ...

item.title: What To Watch This Weekend: New Shows And Movies To Stream On Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Apple TV And More
item.description: Looking for what to stream this weekend? Here’s every major new movie and show hitting Netflix, Hulu, Prime Video, Apple TV and more.

item.title: Hurricane Melissa Shows Why Electricity Access Is Not Grid Resilience
item.description: Hurricane Melissa revealed that near 100% electricity access does not equal true grid resilience. This article examines the structural weaknesses and ...

item.title: Brazil hails ‘historic victory’ after months of pressure as Trump removes 40% tariffs on coffee imports
item.description: The President initially hiked tariffs in protest of the persecution of former President Jair Bolsonaro, who is imprisoned for attempting to stage a co...

item.title: Just 776 FAA employees will get Trump’s $10,000 bonus, but unions say thousands who worked during the shutdown were left out
item.description: The payments will be received no later than Dec. 9, the Federal Aviation Administration said.

item.title: Is ‘Arc Raiders’ Down? Servers Hit With Matchmaking Error
item.description: Arc Raiders is down as matchmaking error stymies gamers.

item.title: After calling Mamdani a ‘100% Communist lunatic,’ Trump now says ‘we’re looking for the same things’
item.description: The Republican president and new Democratic star have indicated an openness to come together for the city they've both called home.

item.title: Trump's $2K tariff dividends could carry a hefty price tag
item.description: Trump's $2,000 tariff dividend plan could cost $600 billion annually, far exceeding current tariff revenues of $300 billion per year, budget watchdog ...

item.title: Just four members of the Dow — including two giant banks — are in the red Friday
Are Americans unhappy — or are we just using our money the wrong way?

DEI consultant resigns from Cracker Barrel board after heated proxy fight
item.description: Cracker Barrel shareholders backed nine of 10 board nominees, including CEO Julie Felss Masino.

item.title: December interest rate cut in doubt as Fed minutes show policymakers divided
item.description: Federal Reserve policymakers remain divided on December interest rate cuts as FOMC minutes revealed differing views on monetary policy amid inflation ...

item.title: Voters express economic worries over inflation as costs rise, Fox News poll finds
item.description: A Fox News poll shows 76% of voters view the economy negatively, with 61% disapproving of President Donald Trump's economic handling amid rising costs...

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
